thread.title: Police trying to identify man found dead in NW Calgary home
thread.title_full: Police trying to identify man found dead in NW Calgary home

author: Michael Ranger
title: Police trying to identify man found dead in NW Calgary home
text:
Police trying to identify man found dead in NW Calgary home
Posted Apr 9, 2025 3:07 pm.
Police are asking for help identifying a man who was found dead in a northwest Calgary home earlier this week.
Calgary police were called to a home on Carrington Crescent NW in the community of Carrington around 6:30 p.m. Monday for reports of a break and enter.
A man was found dead inside the home.
Police believe the victim broke into the home, but the reason for the break-in is still unknown. Investigators are still trying to identify the man after completing an autopsy on Wednesday.
Security photos of the man, as well as images of his tattoos have been released in hopes someone will be able to identify him.
Anyone with information is being asked to call police at 403-266-1234, or submit tips to CrimeStoppers anonymously.
